mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into mesl_into_storehouse (expressorder_number, into_storehouse_date, destination, area_code, row_code, shelves_code, seat_code) values (#{expressorderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{intoStorehouseDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{destination,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rowCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shelvesCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seatCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into mesl_into_storehouse
expressorder_number,
into_storehouse_date,
destination,
area_code,

INSERT INTO mesl_into_storehouse ( expressorder_number, into_storehouse_date, destination, area_code, row_code, shelves_code, seat_code ) VALUE ( #{expressorderNumber},#{intoStorehouseDate},#{destination},#{areaCode},#{rowCode},#{shelvesCode},#{seatCode})
mapper.select: SELECT expressorder_number AS expressorderNumber, into_storehouse_date AS intoStorehouseDate, destination, area_code AS areaCode, row_code AS rowCode, shelves_code AS shelvesCode, seat_code AS seatCode FROM mesl_into_storehouse

SELECT expressorder_number AS expressorderNumber, into_storehouse_date AS intoStorehouseDate, destination, area_code AS areaCode, row_code AS rowCode, shelves_code AS shelvesCode, seat_code AS seatCode FROM mesl_into_storehouse WHERE into_storehouse_date BETWEEN #{startDate} and #{endDate}

select expressorder_number as expressorderNumber,area_code as areaCode, row_code as rowCode, shelves_code as shelvesCode, seat_code as seatCode from mesl_into_storehouse where expressorder_number = #{expressorderNumber}
